examples.example: 门前的枇杷树结满了黄澄澄的枇杷，让人看了心生欢喜。

translate.english: The loquat tree in front of the door is full of yellow loquats, which makes people feel happy when looking at it.

examples.example: 我家后院有棵枇杷树，每年都会结出又大又甜的枇杷，让我们享受丰收的喜悦。

translate.english: There is a loquat tree in my backyard, and every year it bears big and sweet loquats, allowing us to enjoy the joy of harvest.

examples.example: 我和家人一起坐在枇杷树下乘凉，享受着美好的时光。

translate.english: I sit under the loquat tree to enjoy the cool with my family and enjoy the wonderful time.
